definitions.definition: a circumstance that complicates something; a difficulty.
examples: there is a complication concerning ownership of the site

definitions.definition: an involved or confused condition or state.
examples: to add further complication, English speakers use a different name
synonyms: convolutedness "the complication of life in our society"

definitions.definition: a secondary disease or condition aggravating an already existing one.
examples: she developed complications after the surgery
